alert.note: Alert for Dunn; Polk; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 4:59PM CDT until August 11 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dunn County in west central Wisconsin... Northeastern St. Croix County in west central Wisconsin... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Star Prairie, or 22 miles northeast of River Falls, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glenwood City, Boyceville and Knapp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
